definition: a hard brick used as a paving stone, to turn to clinker or form clinker under excessive heat in burning
details:
noun
- a hard brick used as a paving stone
= synonyms: clinker brick
- a fragment of incombustible matter left after a wood or coal or charcoal fire
= synonyms: cinder
verb
- to turn to clinker or form clinker under excessive heat in burning
- to clear out the cinders and clinker from
= example: to clear out the cinders and clinker from
